reporter_caption.center: IN RE PATTERSON MEDICAL DX, 02-06-281-CV (Tex.App.-Ft. Worth 8-17-2006)

caption.center: IN RE PATTERSON MEDICAL DIAGNOSIS, ROGERS CHIROPRACTIC CLINIC, GISSELL
MEZA, SUSANNA LOPEZ, CLIFF ROGERS, D.C., AND RICK SMITH, D.C., Relators.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Second District, Fort Worth.

opinion.panel: Panel A: HOLMAN, J.; CAYCE, C.J.; and WALKER, J.
opinion.opinion_text:
The court has considered relators' petition for writ of mandamus and emergency motion for stay and is of the opinion that relief should be denied. Accordingly, relators' petition for writ of mandamus and emergency motion for stay are denied.
Relators shall pay all costs of this original proceeding, for which let execution issue.
